display.title: Into the Twilight Forest
display.description:
Make the Twilight Forest portal by tossing a Twilight Diamond into a 2x2 pool of water surrounded by flowers. Jump in to enter the forest, and return unharmed with an ironwood ingot.

Twilight Forest is a dimension exploration mod focused on adventure that will take you on a journey to meet strange creatures, exploring dungeons, and much more.
